title: The Magical World of Fairies
description: A delightful anthology of stories about fairies and their animal friends, which is sure to engage young readers. Chapters include The Royal Flying Race, The Butterfly Babies, The Blossom Ball, The Fruits of the Forest, The Uninvited Guest and the Secrets of the Snow. Perfect for reading aloud to small children, or for more confident readers to enjoy by themselves.
author: Nicola Baxter
